Based on the principle, "like cures" like, homeopathy identifies and uses the underlying cause of the ailment as the treatment. More often than not, the source of a physical ailment stems from an imbalance in your system. Homeopathic treatments use natural remedies to restore physical, mental, and emotional balance in your body. Homeopathic medicine got its start in the late 18th century in Germany. The basic principles behind homeopathic treatment can be expressed in three words: "like cures like." In other words, homeopathy uses the underlying cause of a medical condition to teach your body how to restore its natural balance. Homeopathic medicine treats a wide range of health conditions.
